duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage your own portfolio of candidates and clients, both existing and new.
Working in a fast-paced role in which you will be interacting with numerous hiring managers, assisting them with their staffing needs.
Source multiple candidates and clients utilizing cold calls, LinkedIn Recruiter, our ATS, Job Adverts, and referrals.
Delivering a superb candidate experience that begins with the initial phone call all the way through delivering and closing the offer.
Responsible for 'hunting' new business opportunities through market research, lead generation, referrals and more.
Using social media, networking events, job adverts, headhunting, and referrals to discover high-quality clients, pull jobs from, and fill with your top talent candidates.
